page.title: 04SHOPPING CENTRE,CHEADLE.
page.content: THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE WHO DO THEIR SHOPPING IN CHEADLE SHOP THERE TWICE EVERY WEEK. MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO DO THEIR MAIN SHOPPING IN THE SUPERMARKETS MOSTLY USE TESCO OR GATEWAY SUPERMARKETS. BUT MANY OF THE PEOPLE WHO USE THESE SUPERMARKETS FIND IT BETTER TO USE A SEPARATE BUTCHERS. THE MAJORITY SHOP FOR THEIR MEAT AT CHEADLE. MANY OF THE PEOPLE WHO SHOP IN CHEADLE THINK IT HAS A LARGE VARIETY OF SHOPS BUT IT COULD DO WITH A BOYS CLOTHES SHOP. THE ROAD INTO CHEADLE HAS ONE PUBLIC CROSSING WHICH VIRTUALLY EVERYBODY THINKS IS NOT SUFFICIENT FOR THE TRAFFIC THAT GOES THROUGH CHEADLE BUT THE MAJORITY THINK PARKING FACILITIES ARE ADEQUATE.
